item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, May 1, 2025 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Redis is open source again (807 points | 305 comments)
2. Oxide's compensation model: how's it going? (28 points | 13 comments)
3. Claude Integrations (261 points | 102 comments)
4. Dopamine signals when a fear can be forgotten (78 points | 45 comments)

6. A faster way to copy SQLite databases between computers (348 points | 145 comments)

13. Waypoint Transit (YC W25) Is Hiring a Founding Engineer ( | hide)
14. New Study: Waymo is reducing serious crashes and making streets safer (112 points | 104 comments)

22. Trust Me, I'm Local: Chrome Extensions, MCP, and the Sandbox Escape (103 points | 25 comments)
23. Arizona laptop farmer pleads guilty for funneling $17M to Kim Jong Un (89 points | 43 comments)
24. How the Water System Works (20 points | 3 comments)
25. The Gang Has a Mid-Life Crisis (215 points | 158 comments)

28. Mac app launches slowed by malware scan (2024) (59 points | 14 comments)
29. Are you the same person you used to be? (2022) (38 points | 67 comments)
30. International Workers' Day (321 points | 123 comments)
